context: The COVID-19 pandemic in 2020 dramatically accelerated digital transformation initiatives globally. Companies urgently needed help with cloud migration, remote work enablement, automation, and digital customer experiences. The consulting market saw heightened demand for cybersecurity, data analytics, and AI implementation services. Accenture reported over $44 billion in revenue as organizations invested heavily in technology-enabled transformation.
